mapper.sql: a.paymeth_code AS "paymethCode", a.paymeth_name AS "paymethName", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_paymeth a
AND a.paymeth_code LIKE '%'||#{paymethCode}||'%' '%'+#{paymethCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{paymethCode}, '%')
AND a.paymeth_name LIKE '%'||#{paymethName}||'%' '%'+#{paymethName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{paymethName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_paymeth( paymeth_code, paymeth_name, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{paymethCode}, #{paymethName}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_paymeth SET paymeth_code = #{paymethCode}, paymeth_name = #{paymethName}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
